item.description:
The weather isn't coorperating for our original plans of having a wonderful lunch & afternoon of skiing. As a result, I'm setting up a meetup at Sea Dog for an early dinner.

Did I mention they are also participating in restaurant week?! YES! That means a 3-course meal for $20. Here is their restaurant week menu for reference:

http://www.mainerestaurantweek.com/detail.php?id=101

You may still order from their regular menu.

See you Sunday! Please plan to arrive between 4:45-5 as they don't take reservations.
item.how_to_find_us: If you don't see us in the entry waiting to be seated, as the hostess for "Rebecca" or "meetup".
item.why: Great food & beer. PLUS, it's restaurant week and they are participating!
item.name: Sea Dog Brewing
